titles.title: A bill to clear certain impediments to the licensing of a vessel for employment in the coastwise trade and fisheries of the United States.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Referred to Subcommittee on Merchant Marine.

bill.summary: 9/30/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to cause a named vessel to be documented as a vessel of the United States entitled to engage in the coastwise trade and fisheries.
